{{Infobox Berry |name = #21 Pomeg |image = [[File:Pomeg.png]] |caption = When this sweetly spicy Berry's thick skin is peeled, many pieces of the fruit spill out. |growtime = 1h 30m 0s |harvest = 20 berries |replant = 20% |points = 500 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *10 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} == Description == '''Pomeg''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Iapapa]] and at least 1 [[Mago]]. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 mins 20 secs || 20 mins || 1 hour 6 mins 40 secs || 1 hour 30 mins - 3 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PomegTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PomegTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PomegTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 1 hour 6 mins 40 secs -
2 hours 13 mins 20 secs || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 44 mins 26 secs -
1 hour 28 mins 52 secs || 9 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 29 mins 38 secs -
59 mins 16 secs || 6 mulch |} == Flow Chart ==
{| style="text-align: center;" |+ '''Flow Chart to get this berry''' |- | Random
Drop || || Random
Drop |- | ↓ || || ↓ |- | [[File:Pecha.png|20px]] [[Pecha]] || || [[File:Aspear.png|20px]] [[Aspear]] |- | ↓ || || ↓ |- | [[File:Iapapa.png|20px]] [[Iapapa]] || + || [[File:Mago.png|20px]] [[Mago]] |- | || ↓ || |- | || [[File:Pomeg.png|20px]] [[Pomeg]] |}
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Pomeg berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || || || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || || || [[File:Iapapa.png|30px]] [[Iapapa]] || |- | || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] || || || [[File:Mago.png|30px]] [[Mago]] |} === Timing Table === {| class="collapsible wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch/Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch*Sprayduck |- | [[Iapapa]] || - || - || - |- | [[Mago]] || 6 mins 10 secs until ripe || 4 mins 7 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |} {{Berries}}

{{Infobox Berry |name = #21 Pomeg |image = [[File:Pomeg.png]] |caption = When this sweetly spicy Berry's thick skin is peeled, many pieces of the fruit spill out. |growtime = 1h 30m 0s |harvest = 20 berries |replant = 20% |points = 500 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *10 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} == Description == '''Pomeg''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]].
